headline: Johnson Controls (JCI) Expands Data Center Cooling Capabilities with Alloy Enterprises Acquisition
summary: Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE:JCI) is included among the 13 Best Performing Long Term Stocks to Invest in. On February 18, Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE:JCI) signed an agreement to acquire Alloy Enterprises, a Boston-based company that develops advanced thermal management platforms for high-performance data centers and other mission-critical industrial applications. The acquisition is expected […]
